version_description:
Hey, trendsetters! It’s time to get your vogue on, with our new COVER DESIGN MISSIONS!
Create your very own fashion magazine cover and show off your super stylish talents!

> BUGS?! Not on our turf! We evacuated all the creepy crawling intruders.
> We made some improvements to the game - it's now better than ever!
> Like our Facebook page to stay up to date on our latest games: facebook.com/tabtale

Hey, Super Stylists! We have another super stylish update for you:
NEW LEVELS! Just like you asked for! Tons of fabulous fun up the road!

Hey, Super Stylists! We have another super stylish update for you:
NEW LEVELS! Just like you asked for! Tons of fabulous fun up the road!
Want some more? You got it! Enjoy our awesome new challenge: “What’s Her Style”!

Hi, fashionistas! Ready to discover a new fashion treasure?
Update now to enjoy 10 new catalogs, full of glamour and style!

Hi, fashion stars! We have a super stylish update for you:
> NEW CATALOGS! Just like you asked for! Tons of fabulous fun up the road!

Make this Christmas extra stylish, with 2 fantabulous new Christmas collections!
Happy holidays!

> Bugs, bugs, go away, don't come again another day! We got rid of any unwelcome creatures!
> Show us how much you love the game - leave a 5 star rating!
> Don't forget to write a review too - we actually read them!

Hi, Super Stylists! It’s cold outside but hot in here!
We have a super winter stylish update for you:
4 NEW WINTER CATALOGS!

Hi, Super Stylists! It’s cold outside but hot in here!
We have a super winter stylish update for you:
4 NEW WINTER CATALOGS!

Want some more? You got it!
Enjoy our NEW HAIRSTYLES so you will always be in style!

> Hi, fashion stars! We have a super stylish update for you:
> NEW CATALOGS! Just like you asked for! Tons of fabulous fun up the road!

Get ready to fall in love on February 14th with our Valentines Day Event:
Special Limited edition collection!

Feeling Lucky today? Spin the wheel and WIN YOUR DAILY PRIZE!!
Bug fixes and level improvements.
Update now to enjoy a smoother game performance!

> BUGS?! Not on our turf! We evacuated all the creepy crawling intruders.
> We made some improvements to the game - it's now better than ever!

Hey, Super Stylists! We have another super-stylish update for you:10 NEW LEVELS!
Tons of fabulous fun up the road!

Hey, trendsetters! It’s time to get in shape!
Update now to get a fantabulous new “Sporty Vibes” catalog.

> Bug fixes and level improvements.
> Update now to enjoy a smoother game performance!

> NEW Fashion Tour Event - Now in Madrid!
Complete the tour and get a new fashionable “ Steam Catalog “

> Want to know how good your style is? Find out in our NEW Fashion battle!
Compete against other stylists and get your score!

> New limited-time event: Movie Gala - Get the new premium collection “Bacchanal”.
Only from 1.5-10.5.2020. Don’t miss it!

We have a New Event for you: Cover Week.

How does it work? Choose a cover from the many options we have full of an infinite number of pixels for you to color.

Completed a cover? Get a new item from our premium collection!
The more covers you make the closer you will get the whole collection and can dress up your clients!

This event is only available for the next 5 days. Don’t miss it!

Hey, trendsetters! Are you always a bridesmaid, never a bride?

Well, that is going to change! Save the date to the 5th of June for the wedding event of the year! Enjoy our All-white Wedding! Don’t miss out this will be a limited-time event

Hey, Super Stylists! We have another super stylish update for you:
> NEW Fashion Tour Event - Now in Berlin!
> 20 NEW LEVELS! Tons of fabulous fun up the road!
> 5 NEW CATALOGS!

Hi fashion girls, are you ready for this week’s update???
> NEW Fashion Tour Event - Now in Munich!
> New limited time event: Fireworks - Complete fashion missions and get the new premium collection “Free Spirit”.
Only from 3.7-12.7.2020. Don’t miss it!

> Update to enjoy bug fixes and gameplay improvements.
> Are you a fan? Don’t be cheap with the stars!
Bug fixes for better game playing
Bug fixes for smoother playing
Bug fixes for smoother playing

The Golden Event is here!
> Golden Autumn event 9-18/10/20:
Special quest event, new outfits & accessories collection for limited edition!
> New Limited time Ring collection 2-4/10/20
> Get the new premium collection “Spiaggia”.
Only from 6-9/10/20 Don’t miss it!
Bug fixes for smoother playing

Get ready for the spookiest fashion event of the year!
- Halloween Event 30/10 - 8/11:
A new quest, collection and missions. Don't miss our time-limited Halloween customs!
- New: Fantasy Collection! 28/10-30/10
- Dazzling new jewelry collections and more
- NEW Fashion Tour Event - Now in Boston!
- Get the new premium collection “Aurantiaco”.
Only from 20/10 - 24/10 Don’t miss it!

> Don’t forget Halloween Event 30/10 - 8/11!
> New: Goth Collection! 13/11-17/11
All-Black Friday the 13th!
>Get the look - complete missions to unlock a full Head-To-Toe outfit! 10/11-12/11
> November Birthstone collection 20/11-22/11
Dazzling new jewelry collection
> 20 NEW LEVELS! Tons of fabulous fun up the road!
> Get the new gemstone collection “Peridot and Spinel”.
Only from 9/11-11/11 Don’t miss it!

Hi, there all you Stylist Fans!
Get ready for our New events:
> RAFFLE DRAW 23/11-26/11:
> Get your ticket and You can win big prizes!
> New hairstyles and accessories
> Black Friday sale! 50% off selected catalogs on 27/11-29/11!!!
> The Christmas advent calendar is coming! Unwrap your daily gift from Dec 1st.
> NEW challenges await! Pixel and cover week!
> Bug fixes for smoother playing

It’s the season to be FASHION!

> Dazzling new earrings collection - 8-10/12
> Get into the holiday spirit with our all-new limited-time Holiday collections:
Avery collection 11-17/12 - The only time in the year you can wear red & green!
Neva collection 18-24/12 - High-end and icy collection

Special Holiday offer!
All this and more you can enjoy from level 5! So hurry up!

Christmas grandioza is here!
Get to the holiday spirit from level 5! Don't miss our biggest event ever!

Coming up next:
New: Fantasy Collection! 30\12\20-1\1\21
A one-of-a-kind outfit!

Get the look - complete the weekend missions to unlock a full outfit! 25/12 -27/12

Level Up Event - New! Complete 3 levels and earn an exclusive Collection 28/12 - 30/12

The moment has arrived! Celebrate 2021 with our dazzling exclusive Collection 1\1-5\1

Hi fashion girls, it’s cold out, but here things are getting HOT!
> Our NEW WINTER EVENT is here!
> Don’t miss out on our new premium winter collection! 8/1- 14/1
> Dazzling new rings collection - 5/1- 7/1
> Get the look for this week - complete the weekend missions to unlock a full outfit! 15/1-17/1
> RAFFLE DRAW 4/1-7/1:
Get your ticket and You can win big prizes!
> Don’t forget to start 2021 with our NEW YEAR Event!

Hi fashion fans, are you ready for our next update???
New events are available from level 5:
> Our NEW WINTER EVENT is finally here! Don’t miss out 8/1- 14/1
> #TBT: Bacchanal collection is BACK for a limited time only! 20/1-24/1
> Level Up Event - Complete 3 levels and earn rewards 25/1 - 27/1.
> January Birthstone jewelry & hair accessories collections 22/1-24/1
> New: A one-of-a-kind Fantasy outfit! 26/1-28/1
> Get ready for our new quest! Accumulate points to unlock prizes! 29/1-31/1

Get ready to fall in love with this update!
New events are available from level 5:
> RAFFLE DRAW 1\2 - 4\2:
Get your ticket and You can win big prizes!
> #TBT: St. Valentines' collection is BACK for a limited time only! 3\2-7\2
> Valentines Day Event 12\2-18\2
A new quest, premium collection, store sale, and Cover Coloring mission.
> Get the look for this week - 5\2 - 7\2
> February earrings & hair accessories collections 8\2 - 12\2
> A new quest! Accumulate points to unlock prizes! 19\2-21\2

Hey, Super Stylists!
First off, great news! We are back to our beloved facial expressions!
We also have new events lined up, available from level 5:
Level Up- Complete 3 levels and unlock rewards 22\2 - 24\2.
A one-of-a-kind Fantasy outfit! 24\2 - 26\2
February Birthstone collection - Amethyst 26\2 - 28\2
Store sale- Extra 30% on our store packs 26\2 - 28\2
Raffle draw- Earn a ticket and win big prizes 1\3 - 4\3
March earrings collection 3\3 - 5\3
Get our new Collection: Abstract 5\3 - 10\3
